about_the_game:
Welcome, Vault Hunter, to a pinball game of looting and jackpot shooting! Armed with your trusty silver balls, face down fearsome psychos, skags, and bosses as you fight your way across Pandora!

- Level up, minion! Shoot the spinning target and earn points to increase your pinball prowess!
- Catch-a-Riiiiiiideee! Shoot the spindisk and goooooooo!
- Poking a Skag never hurt anyone! Play right and he'll reward you.
- Congratulations, you've found the Vault! Now all you have to do is survive the Boss and the loot is yours. Try not to die!
- Oh, you did die. No problem! Save your ball with precise shots and you'll be a whole New-U!
detailed_description:
Welcome, Vault Hunter, to a pinball game of looting and jackpot shooting! Armed with your trusty silver balls, face down fearsome psychos, skags, and bosses as you fight your way across Pandora!

- Congratulations, you've found the Vault! Now all you have to do is survive the Boss and the loot is yours. Try not to die!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz / Intel Core i7-4770K@3.5GHz or Ryzen 5 1500X@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or AMD R9 380
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
